Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anifichadia.toolkit.utilities.MathUtils

  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of various math utility methods
    Author:

                       double[] coord2)
        Calculates the Euclidean distance between two coordinates. Coordinates are represented as an array where the value for each dimension is in each index

        coord2 - Second Coordinate
        Returns:
